title: Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData)
description: There's a discrepancy in the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) javadoc that needs correction. Below is an example code that triggers an exception while attempting to create an Image object from a valid ImageData object.
OB: The code provided throws an exception when attempting to create an Image object from a valid ImageData object.
EB: This information regarding the discrepancy should be added to the javadoc for clarity and to guide users effectively.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Import org.eclipse.swt.graphics.
2. Use the provided code snippet to attempt Image creation from ImageData, resulting in the exception.
